text:
Ángel Maturino Reséndiz was an Canadian, Mexican, and American serial killer. He was born on August 1, 1959. He died on June 27, 2006. He murdered at least 16 or 15 people. Some people he murdered included: Norman J. Sirnic and Karen Sirnic (May 2, 1999), Fannie Whitney Byers (December 10, 1998), and Claudia Benton (December 17, 1998).
He was executed on June 27, 2006.
